post.body: about your coffee for @lizzyw...you wanna job at AWAKE??? We're lookin for a few good volunteers!
AMEN!!!
will it be available to view online after Christmas? I would love to see it but won't be in Nashville until later that week
Congrats on the new J-O-B!!!
praying for you tonight...this morning was right on the $$...God is using you well! Thanks for listening to Him.
cute movie!!! If you decide to save the world let me know, "I'll get my ball!"
O Holy Night...actually I'd prefer to hear some of my favorites sing it since I can't carry a tune!!!
I was thinking about paddle boating at Bethel!
Woo Hoo!!! Too late to DM my email address? You know I love a bargain...and my shoe fetish!
Friday (12/26) to Wednesday (12/31)
I can't DM you because you don't follow me ;(
AMAZING!!! Thanks for sharing...that pumps me up even more!!!
your trip home is cracking me up!!! Thanks for the entertainment!
CoffeeCupNews is where I get my Coffee News. I love CoffeeCupNews
ABSOLUTELY!!! 4 hours and counting!
Whew! I made it thru day 1 of this wk! The kids are SUPER excited...of course my lessons all being Christmas related doesn't help calm them!
Did you see it snow in Gvl today??? You did if you were at NewSpring! You also saw 42 salvations! What a day!
Heading out for shopping and family time! I love Saturdays!!!
is relaxing and enjoying quiet mommy time! Needing to get to work on those Christmas cards!
BTW, did you know there is a full moon? My students do...they are going nuts...full moon and 1 week till Christmas break...who planned that?
8 weeks out of surgery today!!! I can begin running routine in the morning!
rubbed elbows with tiger elite, now I am wiped out...but still excited about NS gettin' cocky!!!
NewSpring in Gamecock country!!! WooHoo!
While making reindeer ornaments a 1st grader just said, "Mrs. Roberts, I'm having trouble with the ANT EAR!" LOL!!!
Breakfast club - done, morning huddle - done, 1st grade math workshop - done, morning coffee - in progress, productive day so far!
jammies and sofa had to wait...opted for work out clothes and wii fit!
my jammies just called...they want me to come home and curl up on the sofa with them
Up and at 'em! Taking coffee to church, few errands, then lunch with the girls! Chili and cornbread on the menu!
Looking for someone to watch our dog while we are out of town. Any dog lovers staying in GVL for the holidays???
Slept late then got up to make eggs, grits, biscuits for the boys. Now they are playing & I am bundled by the fire...gonna be a great day!
Polar Express was fun...felt like we were in the North Pole...kids ate pancakes and drank hot chocolate...so fun!
Heading out to watch Polar Express on the side of a friend's house! Time to bundle up!
R U kidding me? 141 salvations @NewSpring & still 2 services 2 go! If U have a lost friend get them there tonight at 6pm Anderson or G'ville
Can't WAIT for @NewSpring tomorrow! Sure God will move in an amazing way...will you be there? Come on, I'll have coffee waiting for you!
Just came home from Christmas with mom's combined with my brother's 40th birthday! So much fun. Love time with my mom, grandma, and siblings
Guess who is on vacation for the next 16 days!!! Woo Hoo!
4 more hours!!! Surprisingly...they are better than yesterday...still excited, just not CRAZY!
Asst. Principal just made a "Special Deilvery" to our class. A box of ice cold silver bells from the reindeer!!!
Class watching Polar Exp, having cookies & cocoa...remind me to NEVER go to the movies w/ this group! They've talked thru the whole movie!
Polar Express day in multiage land. Wearing jammies to school is so fun! Let's just hope there are no errands to run after school ;)
